comment.author: 58446043@N04
comment._content: This is the Dinosaur National Monument dig by the Smithsonian, although the image is backwards (right is left)

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Thanks so much for the input! Due to their format and age, it is sometimes very difficult to tell which side the emulsion is on or if these are originals or copies (which can affect orientation regardless of emulsion side and therefore help in deciding which way to scan). Your keen eye gives some great things to think about for us and others looking at these images. Thank you!

Sonoe
Field Book Project
